product_name: Thule SUP Taxi Stand Up Paddleboard Carrier
long_description: The Thule SUP Taxi stand-up paddleboard carrier hauls your big board to that perfect spot to catch those waves. Telescoping design allows carrier to be adjusted to fit boards up to 34 in. wide. Heavy-duty, steel-reinforced webbing straps wrap around board, securing against the padding; straps are secured against board with a locking cam. Soft, weather-resistant padding protects the board during transport. Can be locked in place using Thule One Key System lock cylinders; 4 locks included, 2 for locking strap assembly and 2 for Speed-Link(TM). Offering a universal fit, Thule SUP Taxi rack system works on round bars and most factory racks.
short_description: The Thule SUP Taxi stand-up paddleboard carrier hauls your big board to that perfect spot to catch those waves.
